Package rampancy.management

Interface Summary
EnemyListener Interface for objects that need to listen to changes with EnemyMovements
TargetingManagerListener This is the interface for objects that want to listen to the targeting manager
 

Class Summary
EnemyManager This class tracks enemy movements and provides updates to objects listening to enemy movements.
MovementManager This class handles Durandal's movement calculation
StatisticsManager This class manages data gathered from enemy robot movements and from Durandal's movement/attack
TargetingManager This class handles Durandal's targeting
WaveManager This class manages collections of EnemyWave and BulletWave
